title: The Latest ‘Wicked’ Brand Collabs Flying in Ahead of November’s ‘Wicked: For Good’ Release
summary: A running list of the latest and greatest movie-inspired clothing, beauty products, homeware, games and collectibles. Plus, a comprehensive list of collaborations from 'Wicked: Part 1.'

title: Stars Come Out to Support ‘All the Cool Girls Get Fired’: “We Want the Shame to Be Gone”
summary: Laura Dern, Cindy Crawford, Monica Lewinsky, Zoey Deutch, Jurnee Smollett and Uzo Aduba were among the A-listers who joined Tory Burch to celebrate Kristina O’Neill and Laura Brown’s new book.

title: Cameron Crowe Recalls Young Sean Penn Giving an Acting Masterclass on ‘Fast Times at Ridgemont High’ Set
summary: Reading an excerpt from his new memoir, 'The Uncool,' the writer-director says Universal admitted it 'fucked up' the release of the film, which nonetheless kicked off the '80s teen-movie craze.
